item.title: Test Itemized Nov 20
item.description: Titanic: Machine Learning from disaster https://www.kaggle.com/c/titanic ## ── Attaching packages ───────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.1.0 ✔ purrr 0.2.5 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.6 ## ✔ tidyr 0.8.2 ✔ stringr 1.3.1 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.3.0 ## Warning: package 'dplyr' was built under R version 3.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ──────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(knitr) library(rmdformats) ## Global options options(max.
